name: belgand
text: I must respectfully disagree. If you're getting your bone on to Captain Beefheart then you are most definitely doing everything right. That is rocking the chubbiest of bones.

name: foea
text: Your appreciation for esoteric rythyms is a credit to your kind, but man, some of that shit is too intense. Not bad, it'd just be like having someone fire a starting pistol in the room at odd intervals just when you're trying to lay on a steady pounding.

name: belgand
text:
Steady is overrated. I prefer to use odd time signatures when I am applying bone. All getting down with 13/8 and 5/4 time. A lady will appreciate the attention to her pleasuring not to mention if you choose to get into more complex polyrhythms. The downside is that sometimes you need a good metronome to keep in the bedroom.

If more proof is needed then why are drummers so often commended for their inexplicable sexual prowess and little else? I think this may be the proof we all need.

Just don't all be some old person totally boning in a slow waltz time or a bog-standard 4/4.

name: farqussus
text: Cedric Bixler-Zavala is terrible in the sack.

name: belgand
text: Neil Peart, however, requires at least three ladies to be effective.

name: landowmpg
text: John Theodore, however...

name: belgand
text:

text:
Let's make love!

... and listen to Death from Above.

A song about a song during sex, win. Meanwhile for others that are missing the reference, I am not hitting on heccibiggs... unless she wants me to.

name: origotoshi
text: Ah, you bought one of the original Zunes too? That's where I was introduced to that song. They had some... interesting music videos on there.

name: woodenteeth
text: Heard the track on a national radio station here actually. I don't know what Zunes is... but I'm going to Google me up some right now.

name: lucid
text: I still hold that La Femme d'Argent is probably the ultimate strip tease song in existence. Nobody has shown me anything that comes remotely close.

name: professorhazard
text: This comic has always given me the clear impression that Todd and Blister's First Times were in fact the Same Time, but that neither of them are smart enough to make the connection.

name: mo_rose
text: so...todd listens to sting tapes?

name: professorhazard
text:
I didn't really mean that Todd was the one getting fucked, just that both squirrels were there, possibly with a third or even more squirrels.

They ain't just sweepin' and prayin' up in the treetops all day, you know.

name: origotoshi
text:
Huh, when I read it, I saw it as it was just the two of them. They'd have to be pretty drunk to not notice the fact though...

text: But Blister seems to be doing OK as a come-back-from-the -dead car mechanic.  I guess it's a savant power.

name: belgand
text: If you know what you're doing your first time it is an obvious sign that you are having sex too late for it to be cool and closing in on pathetic that you haven't gotten your bone on yet. This is the realm of the mid-college first time.

name: woodenteeth
text: I have had much sex to Tool and it was good, but then I grew up and started having sex to Oceansize... and it was better.
